summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of CareerIQ FINAL homepage redesign. All 10 sections render in correct order with proper content. All SVG illustrations display correctly. CTA buttons route to /order. Accordion works on mobile. Mobile responsiveness verified at 390px width.
passed_tests: Homepage renders without errors
Section 1 (Hero): Headline 'Stop Getting Silently Rejected' with gradient text
Section 1 (Hero): Career Signal Flow SVG diagram renders (viewBox 0 0 400 120)
Section 1 (Hero): CTA button 'Get My Career Intelligence Report' routes to /order
Section 1 (Hero): Helper text 'One-time report • ₹2,999 • No subscriptions'
Section 2 (Core Pain Reveal): 'Why Strong Profiles Get Ignored' title
Section 2 (Core Pain Reveal): Invisible Wall SVG renders (viewBox 0 0 300 150)
Section 3 (Silent Decision Mechanism): 'What Recruiters Decide Before Shortlisting' title
Section 3 (Silent Decision Mechanism): Recruiter Checklist SVG renders (viewBox 0 0 280 160)
Section 4 (Why CareerIQ Exists): 'The Part Nobody Shows You' title
Section 4 (Why CareerIQ Exists): Lens/X-Ray SVG renders
Section 5 (What You Get): 'What You'll See in Your Report' title
Section 5 (What You Get): All 5 accordion items present (Career Verdict, Risk Signals, Role Mismatch, Execution Guardrails, Decision Summary)
Section 5 (What You Get): Accordion expand/collapse works correctly
Section 5 (What You Get): Report Blueprint SVG renders (viewBox 0 0 200 180)
Section 6 (How It Works): 'How It Works' title with 3-step timeline
Section 6 (How It Works): Timeline SVG renders (viewBox 0 0 100 280)
Section 6 (How It Works): All 3 steps text present
Section 7 (Sample Insight): 'A Sample Insight' title with quote card
Section 7 (Sample Insight): Sample insight quote text displayed
Section 8 (Pricing): 'Complete Career Intelligence Report' title
Section 8 (Pricing): Price ₹2,999 displayed correctly
Section 8 (Pricing): 'One-time payment • Instant delivery' text
Section 8 (Pricing): CTA button routes to /order
Section 9 (Final CTA): 'clarity before you act' text
Section 9 (Final CTA): CTA button routes to /order
Section 10 (Footer): Disclaimer text present
Section 10 (Footer): Privacy Policy link (/privacy)
Section 10 (Footer): Terms of Use link (/terms)
Section 10 (Footer): Support link (mailto:support@careeriq.in)
All 10 sections in correct strict order
Total 3 CTA buttons (Hero, Pricing, Final CTA)
Total 22 SVGs with viewBox render correctly
Mobile responsiveness (390px): All sections visible
Mobile responsiveness (390px): Accordion works
Mobile responsiveness (390px): CTA buttons clickable and route to /order
Mobile responsiveness (390px): Footer links visible
critical_code_review_comments: Gradient text uses inline styles for cross-browser compatibility - correct implementation
All SVG illustrations are abstract (no stock photos/people) per spec
Dark premium theme (#050508 background) with cyan/blue accent colors
Mobile-first design with responsive breakpoints (sm:, md:)
Accordion pattern for 'What You Get' section is mobile-friendly
All CTAs use data-testid='cta-button' for testing
Section IDs present for navigation (hero, pain, mechanism, why, deliverables, process, sample, pricing, final-cta)
context_for_next_testing_agent: CareerIQ FINAL homepage redesign is fully functional. All 10 sections render in strict order: Hero, Core Pain Reveal, Silent Decision Mechanism, Why CareerIQ Exists, What You Get, How It Works, Sample Insight, Pricing, Final CTA, Footer. All SVG-based abstract illustrations render correctly. CTA buttons route to /order. Accordion works in What You Get section. Mobile responsiveness verified at 390px width. Dark premium theme with cyan/blue accent is applied correctly.
